Segment.name: AT2
Segment.comment: To specify Bill of Lading quantity, weight, commodity classification and other details.

Field.name: LadingQuantity1
Field.comment: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

Field.name: PackagingFormCode1
Field.comment: Code for packaging form of the lading quantity

Field.name: WeightQualifier
Field.comment: Code defining the type of weight

Field.name: LadingQuantity2
Field.comment: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

Field.name: PackagingFormCode2
Field.comment: Code for packaging form of the lading quantity

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: CommodityCode
Field.comment: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Field.name: FreightClassCode
Field.comment: Code indicating generalized classification that applies to one or more items in the shipment, i.e., class 70, 77.5, etc.

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: LadingValue
Field.comment: Value of shipment for export, expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

SyntaxNote.name: P0102
SyntaxNote.comment: If either AT201 or AT202 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0607
SyntaxNote.comment: If either AT206 or AT207 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1314
SyntaxNote.comment: If either AT213 or AT214 is present, then the other is required.
